typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Flight#} as string,
		Origin as string,
		Dest as string,
		FlightDate as string,
		NoSalesReason as string,
		TransmittingFlightAttd as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> RIMinput
RIMinput derive(GenericReason = locate(NoSalesReason,'Other')) ~> IsGenerericReason
IsGenerericReason sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RIMSink
